article_title: Kokomo lawyer forms exploratory committee for 2018 Senate run

article_metadata.news_keywords: , joe donnelly, patient protection and affordable care act, mark hurt, crane, united states senate, america, primary election, healthcare reform, isis, indiana, michigan state university, health care adviser, fred grandy, israel, baylor university, iran, taylor university, richard baker, noblesville, law offices, health insurance, post-traumatic stress disorder, dan coats, senate, lawyer, islamic republic of iran

og.description: With years of political experience and a sense that America is moving in the wrong direction, Kokomo lawyer Mark Hurt is considering a run for the United States Senate.
